statements: SELECT * FROM client_portfolios WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM client_portfolios WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT name FROM client_portfolios WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT client_id, name FROM client_portfolios WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM client_portfolios ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM client_portfolios WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM client_portfolios ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_portfolios WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT COUNT(client_id) AS total_clients FROM client_portfolios;
SELECT client_id, phone_number, name FROM client_portfolios WHERE client_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolio;
SELECT id, client_name, balance FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT client_name, account_number FROM ClientPortfolio ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT asset_type, allocation FROM AssetAllocation WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, balance FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE account_number LIKE 'ACC-%';
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE balance > 5000
SELECT client_name, balance FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE client_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT client_name, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM ClientPortfolio GROUP BY client_name HAVING total_balance > 10000
SELECT client_name, asset_type, allocation FROM ClientPortfolio JOIN AssetAllocation ON ClientPortfolio.id = AssetAllocation.client_id WHERE allocation > 0.5
SELECT client_name, account_number FROM ClientPortfolio ORDER BY client_name ASC
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolios;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM ClientPortfolios WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT portfolio_id, allocation_percentage FROM ClientPortfolios WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM AssetAllocations WHERE allocation_id = 3;
SELECT client_id, asset_type, asset_quantity FROM AssetAllocations WHERE client_id = 4;
SELECT client_id, client_name, portfolio_id, allocation_percentage FROM ClientPortfolios ORDER BY client_id DESC, allocation_percentage ASC;
SELECT * FROM AssetAllocations WHERE asset_quantity > 100 ORDER BY client_id, asset_quantity DESC;
SELECT client_id, portfolio_id, return_rate, volatility FROM InvestmentPerformanceMetrics WHERE return_rate > 5 AND volatility < 10 ORDER BY return_rate DESC, volatility ASC;

SELECT client_id, client_name, portfolio_id, allocation_percentage FROM ClientPortfolios WHERE allocation_percentage > 50 AND client_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY client_name ASC, allocation_percentage DESC;

SELECT client_id, asset_type, asset_quantity FROM ClientPortfolios JOIN AssetAllocations ON ClientPortfolios.client_id = AssetAllocations.client_id WHERE asset_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY client_id, asset_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Client_Portfolios;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE client_age > 30;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT client_name, asset_type, asset_percentage FROM Client_Portfolios JOIN Asset_Allocations ON Client_Portfolios.client_id = Asset_Allocations.client_id;
SELECT client_name, investment_return, investment_date FROM Client_Portfolios JOIN Investment_Performance ON Client_Portfolios.client_id = Investment_Performance.client_id;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM Client_Portfolios
SELECT * FROM Asset_Allocations WHERE asset_percentage > 0.5 ORDER BY allocation_date DESC
SELECT client_name, asset_type, investment_return FROM Client_Portfolios INNER JOIN Investment_Performance ON Client_Portfolios.client_id = Investment_Performance.client_id
SELECT client_name, report_date, report_content FROM Client_Portfolios INNER JOIN Reports ON Client_Portfolios.client_id = Reports.client_id WHERE client_age >= 30
SELECT * FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE client_age < 40
SELECT client_id, client_name, total_assets FROM Client_Portfolios;
SELECT client_id, portfolio_name, creation_date FROM Client_Portfolios ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, asset_type, allocation_percentage FROM Asset_Allocations WHERE client_id = 101;
SELECT client_id, investment_date, investment_return FROM Investment_Performance ORDER BY investment_date ASC;
SELECT client_id, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM Analysis WHERE client_id IN (102, 103) ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_name, total_assets FROM Client_Portfolios;
SELECT client_id, client_name, creation_date FROM Client_Portfolios WHERE total_assets > 100000;
SELECT client_id, asset_type, allocation_percentage FROM Asset_Allocations ORDER BY allocation_percentage DESC;
SELECT client_id, investment_date, investment_return FROM Investment_Performance WHERE investment_return < 0;
SELECT client_id, report_date, report_text FROM Reporting WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(report_text) > 500;
